name: Virtual Dental Surgery
description:
Take on the role of a surgeon and complete a Dental surgery ! The boy has lost a big part of his tooth playing baseball. It's impossible to repair it, so it's time to make a new artificial tooth for him. Dental surgery is considered to be one of the most complicated in the world because even a trifle may become a big problem.
This game will show you almost whole procedure of Dental surgery. Take a part in this realistic surgery game and become a doctor and perform Dental surgery on a patient. You need to analyze the steps that needs to be done and be careful.
